instructions: Image titled Assign a Photo to a Contact on Your Android Phone Step 1 1 Open "Contacts. " Image titled Assign a Photo to a Contact on Your Android Phone Step 2 2 Search and select the contact for whom you want to assign a photo. Image titled Assign a Photo to a Contact on Your Android Phone Step 3 3 Edit the contact. Tap on the empty area present above the contact details, or just select "Edit Contact." Image titled Assign a Photo to a Contact on Your Android Phone Step 4 4 Select either "Take photo" or "Choose photo from Gallery. " This option depends on your choice. Yes, it is that simple! You can now assign photos to your other contacts by following the same method. Advertisement
